title: Manchester United, Arsenal and Man City are fighting for 16-year-old Newcastle starlet Lewis Gibson
text:
KEEN ON TOON Manchester United, Arsenal and Man City are fighting for 16-year-old Newcastle starlet Lewis Gibson 
Magpies braced for battle to hold onto teen defender as interest from the big boys mounts By Gary Stonehouse 31st March 2017, 2:37 pm Updated: 31st March 2017, 2:48 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments NEWCASTLE face a real fight to hold onto their academy ace Lewis Gibson as a host of big clubs plot a move for the teen star. 
The 16-year-old is considered to be one of the brightest talents in England and has already represented his country at Under-17 level. Getty Images 4 Newcastle starlet Lewis Gibson is being watched by a number of big clubs 
Manchester United , neighbours City and Arsenal have all sent scouts to monitor the defender and are believed to be considering a swoop for the ace. 
Keep up to date with all the latest news, gossip, rumours and done deals in SunSport’s live transfer blog 
Gibson is only on scholarship terms on Tyneside, which would enable him to move clubs. 
However, Newcastle are eager to get him tied down to a professional contract as quickly as possible to thwart off any potential suitors.
